name: Luxury Fashion Scarf
description: These are made from 100% alpaca but are the first I have seen that are so light and delicate. They are woven and hand painted in beautiful earth and jewel tone colors, these are long scarves and can be wrapped in many ways. Because they are so exquisite they could be worn all year long, they are certainly dressy enough for a night out and airy enough for the summer too. They are each one of a kind art pieces. The scarves are being listed at $59, they will make a really special gift for yourself or someone special.

name: Felted, Scented, Wool Ornaments Set of 8
description:
Looking for something a little different to hang on your tree or decorate with, these beautifully colored ORNAMENTS will be perfect. I created these ornaments for my grandsons so they could have special ones they could hang that wouldn't break and could be easily handled by little hands. They are created from 100% wool and have built in hangers so no need to buy those little metal hangers. I also use these to scent the room with our favorite holiday scents, I just put a drop of essential oil on each ball and enjoy the aroma. Each set comes with 8 felted ornaments in holiday jewel tones or your choice of color and small bottle bottle of essential oil. These are great to give as a hostess set or keep for yourself, they are hand made and very unique.

CHOICE OF ESSENTIAL OILS (Use On Ornaments Only)

CHRISTMAS WISH Touches of oranges, fresh woody pines rounded out with creamy vanilla make this a cheery wish come true! 

HOLIDAY SPLENDOR A festive blend of holiday spices, cinnamon, clove and nutmeg with cheerful orange and berries as the stars with a foundation of vanilla

AUTUMN HARVEST Generously sprinkled with ground cloves and cinnamon sticks, this warm, rustic scent blends crisp orchard apples and sun-kissed oranges with fresh vanilla cream and woods. 

GINGERBREAD HOUSE A quaint gingerbread house wrapped in sweet sugary vanilla, teaming with spicy cinnamon and clove, decorated with hints of milky coconut and maple.

SCOTCH PINE A crisp, fresh, sweet, forest like aroma. Traditional tree scent.

SANTA'S RETREAT Santas magical helpers relax on fragrant northern pine, enveloped in green, woody fir needle, sprinkled with lilies of the valley and jasmine. Fresh cedar and green moss 


BENEFITS OF OUR SCENTED, FELTED ORNAMENTS
Hand made
100% wool 
One of a kind item
Non-breakable, dogs, cats and toddlers are no worries.
No lost hangers
Can be scented
Easy to store
Will last for many years
Light weight enough for any tree
Eco-friendly
American Grown-American Made

These can also be purchased without the built in hanger and set in bowls or decorative containers. They are a simple way to decorate any room and you can use the essential oils to scent your whole house.



All our products are made using our wool from our herd of alpaca or US grown sheep wool.

name: Felted Wool Soaps
description:
Our soaps are hand made and contain no lanolin, each bar is made with all natural ingredients, essential oils and bits and pieces of flowers or herbs. We think you love how well they lather and that they rinse leaving you feeling clean. The scents are lovely, very clean and aromatic.
We felt each bar of soap with 100% wool, they are custom made for each order, so no two are alike. Each bar is made to order in the colors of your choice, you can chose a single color as many as you like. Some folks like to match their decor, some chose team colors, guys like Camo, and school colors are popular as well. This layer of beautifully colored wool acts like a built in wash cloth or scrubby for each bar. You simply wet the bar and scrub, the wool does the rest. Just rinse when you are done and let it dry until yo are ready to use it again. The wool stays on the bar and also gives the added of benefit of keeping your bar from melting so quickly, so it will extend the life of your bar and protect your investment. 

The felted soap bars can also sit on your bathroom counter and NOT leave all that messy goo that plain bars leave. All Natural Felted Soaps are perfect for little hands, the felt helps them to hold on to the bar with greater ease, no more slippery bars in the tub. The same is true for those who might need assistance or whose hands are feeble. You will also find that these felted soap bars are ideal for camping trips or hunting trips, no need for a wash cloth since it's built in already. All you need to do is set the bar out to dry, thats it. 

Our hand made felted bars are a great gift for your collage student as well. It makes it easy to take all their items to the dorm, without the hassles of bringing extra wash cloths. Our bars will also make beautiful housewarming gifts for your friends and loved ones, keep a few on hand in case you have guest over too. 

What are the ingredients? Very simple, coconut oil, rice bran oil, soybean oil, castor oil, tallow, filtered water, and fragrance oil. Some bars like the lavender have some of the flower in the bar and in the Honey Oatmeal you find pieces of oatmeal. 

We have lots of fragrances to chose from, we are sure you will find one that will become your favorite. This is a list of our current scents:

*Apple Jack & Peel - An aroma of fresh apple, not too sweet.
*Black Cherry – An aroma of ripened sweet black cherries, a favorite.
*Cactus & Sea Salt – Dramatic tones of cactus with fresh green elements, & elements of sea moss & warm driftwood. clean and fresh
*Chamomile – An aroma of freshly picked chamomile flowers. Good for dry skin 
*Christmas Memories – Notes of orange peel and cranberry sauce, flowing into a fragrance of cinnamon sticks and freshly ground cloves with base notes of evergreen and pinecones
*Mountain Air – A aromatic blend that is popular with men
*Lavender– Wonderful aroma of true lavender flowers
*Love Struck – An aroma of peaches, strawberries, raspberries & an undertone of musk
*Midnight Romance – Fresh Kaffir lime, spicy bergamot and floral musk notes followed by African violet, balsam fir, jasmine, & nuguet lily
*Moonlight Path - Delicate pink rose, asian jasmine, soft violets and sweet musk with woodsy notes
*Oatmeal Milk & Honey – Fresh aroma of Hawthorne, with creamy French vanilla, soymilk & nutty almond.
*Pachouli – An earthy aroma of true herbal pachouli
*Pearberry – Fresh fruity fragrance blend of ripened pear, raspberries, strawberries, & gooseberries with a musk undertone
*Pumpkin Walnut Biscotti – Aroma of fresh baked biscotti with notes of pumpkin and fresh walnuts
*Sandalwood – A woody bouquet of cedar & sandalwood with rose & jasmine
*Spring Rain – A fragrance of fresh carnations, tiger lilies, alyssum, orchids, & roses
*Tulip – An aroma of fresh tulips
* Lavender Sage - Wonderful aroma of true lavender flowers with a touch of herbal sage
* Green Clover - very fresh green and herbal notes, clean
All our soaps are hand made and made to order, please allow us up to 3 business days to get your soap felted and ready to go. The wool we use is either sheep wool or alpaca, both raised and purchased in the US. All the alpaca will come from our own herd that we raise on Seven Oaks Farm. If you ever in our area we are open for tours and you can meet all our animals. We also specialize in alpaca yarns, roving, scarves and many other hand made items.

name: Scented Large Dryer Ball Set with Essential Oil
description:
SAVE MONEY   and    SAVE TIME
Our hand made dryer balls are made from 100% wool, they are all natural, made from a renewable resource and are eco-friendly. Our dryer balls are made by hand by me right here on the farm using wet felting and needle felting techniques. The core is from Seven Oaks Farm alpaca with the outside layer being made of American sheep's wool. Our dryer balls come in 2 sizes, large and small and can be ordered unscented or you can choose from 10 essential oils scents. Both the large and small dryer balls come in set of 3, which we recommend to achieve maximum drying efficiency.

Dryer balls allow you to reduce your drying time by about 25-30%  when 3 small balls are used, the savings is even greater with the large set. The ball absorbs the moisture from your clothes in the dryer and releases it more quickly so your load is dry more quickly. Reduced drying time translates into money saved on your electric bill .
The dryer balls also help reduce static electricity and soften your clothes while they tumble in your dryer with a load of clothes. The dryer balls  beat against your clothing as they tumble, this tumbling action helps reduce static cling and reduce wrinkles plus your clothes will feel soft. This "softness" you feel in your laundry is one of the wonderful properties of natural wool. The softness will allow you to never have to buy fabric softener again, you can say goodbye to your dryer sheets, that will translate into huge saving for you. If you would like to scent your laundry you buy the set of dryer balls that come with a vile of 0.5 ounces essential oil and just add a drop or two to each ball. The scent last for several loads and you can buy more than one scent if you wish.
Another great benefit of using all natural dryer balls is to avoid some of the nasty chemicals  and allergens that many fabric softners contain. Dryer balls allow you to save money, save time and truly have a clean load of laundry that will have no added chemicals to worry about. 

Directions for use: Put your set of dryer balls into the dryer with your load of wet clothes. Dry the load on your usual setting. When the load is dry leave the dryer balls in the dryer, they will be dry and ready for the next load. It is that simple, just leave the balls in the dryer and they are always ready to use, you never need to remove them.

Do they last? Yes, for many, many years. They are durable and will remain felted after many years of use. They can be easily repaired by you as well, if needed. Just put the ball into the toe of a sock and run the ball thru the wash and dry  cycles of your machine. That mends about anything and is easy to do.

How much essential oil do I use?  We use all natural essential oils that come in a 0.5 ounce resealable bottle in 10 fragrances we think you'll like. These oils can be strong, a little goes a long way, so start off with just a drop on each ball and add more to increase the aroma as you would like.

Will the color on the dryer ball come off on my clothes?  The balls are originally made by washing them in hot water thru 2 wash cycles. This process stops any bleeding of color etc. and we use good quality wools so it should not be a problem. We have sets of white dryer balls that have no dyes or bleach in them at all, they are colored by Mother Nature. Some folks like to have a white set for lite colored loads and then a set of colored balls for darker clothes.

Why do you offer weighted dryer balls? We use the dryer balls in our own laundry for 5 boys and I have found that doing some of the heavier loads like jeans, towels etc,  it was helpful to increase the amount of tumbling the ball was doing in the dryer. I designed a weighted ball by adding river rock that is felted and then wrapped in alpaca wool and then finished like a regualr ball with wet felting and needle felting. These heavier balls were able to really move around well with the heavier fabrics and reduce wrinkles in really heavy loads. The weighted balls almost double the weight of each ball.

How many do I need? To get real effects of the reduced drying time you can noise, I recommend a set of 3 to start with. The more you put in a load the quicker the load will dry. I washed a load containing 7 regular bath towels and 5 pair of adult size jeans. The time for drying WITHOUT the dryer balls was a full 60 minutes. Washing the same load again the drying time with a set of LARGE dryer balls was 42 minutes. That is a significant savings of time and money!

Other uses? Yes, you will find that your dryer balls will "escape" the dryer once in a while to be used as juggling balls or games of catch. So yes these make great toys since the light weight balls don't knock over items and are a bit safer to play with. Both size of balls are the perfect size for little hand and many are purchased as gifts for children of all ages. The fun doesn't stop there! Cats love these balls especial when they are scented with Catnip! A small sets are perfect for your feline friends and you can divide them up and give to all your cat loving friends too. The dryer balls area  great way to sent your clothing  drawers or entire home as well, they can be set out in a bowl or dish and scent an entire room with no fear of fires from candle flames. 

(When you are ready to purchase please list your essential oil choice in the note section at check out.)

Essential Oils 

Lavender  This essential oil has a fresh, floral herbaceous scent. True lavender scent.

Sweet Orange   This essential oil has a sweet, citrus smell much like the orange peels it is derived from, only more intense and concentrated, very pleasing to most.

Lemon (5 Fold) Strong essential oil that smells like fresh cut lemons, very fresh and pleasing to most.

Sweet Basil  This variety has a sweet vaguely anise-like, mint, smoky scent, very pleasing, clean, will remind you of your garden.

Texas Cedarwood This oil has a sweet, balsamic wood scent, some masculine spicy notes as well.

Cotton Blossom This oil is a very clean, fresh laundry scent, lightly sweet, refreshing.

Warmed Vanilla Sugar This oil is just what you expect, notes of vanilla and the aroma of sweet baked goodies drifting.

Bulgarian Rose This oil is a true rose scent, sweet, just like the freshly cut English roses in the bask yard.

Cucumber Melon   This oil is a mix of sweet melon put together with the clean crispness of cucumber. 

Catnip  This essential oil is truly loved by cats. We inject the core of the dryer balls to be used by our feline friends because it is such a strong oil. We do not send a vile with this set. The scent will last for months!

Why the little red heart? It is a mark to show our commitment to providing quality service to our customers, our commitment to quality products and our commitment to giving back when we can.

Cats love these balls especial when they are scented with Catnip! A small sets are perfect for your feline friends and you can divide them up and give to all your cat loving friends too. The dryer balls area  great way to sent your clothing  drawers or entire home as well, they can be set out in a bowl or dish and scent an entire room with no fear of fires from candle flames. 

(When you are ready to purchase please list your essential oil choice in the note section at check out.)

Essential Oils 

Lavender  This essential oil has a fresh, floral herbaceous scent. True lavender scent.

Sweet Orange   This essential oil has a sweet, citrus smell much like the orange peels it is derived from, only more intense and concentrated, very pleasing to most.

Lemon (5 Fold) Strong essential oil that smells like fresh cut lemons, very fresh and pleasing to most.

Sweet Basil  This variety has a sweet vaguely anise-like, mint, smoky scent, very pleasing, clean, will remind you of your garden.

Texas Cedarwood This oil has a sweet, balsamic wood scent, some masculine spicy notes as well.

Cotton Blossom This oil is a very clean, fresh laundry scent, lightly sweet, refreshing.

Warmed Vanilla Sugar This oil is just what you expect, notes of vanilla and the aroma of sweet baked goodies drifting.

Bulgarian Rose This oil is a true rose scent, sweet, just like the freshly cut English roses in the bask yard.

Cucumber Melon   This oil is a mix of sweet melon put together with the clean crispness of cucumber. 

Catnip  This essential oil is truly loved by cats. We inject the core of the dryer balls to be used by our feline friends because it is such a strong oil. We do not send a vile with this set. The scent will last for months!

Why the little red heart? It is a mark to show our commitment to providing quality service to our customers, our commitment to quality products and our commitment to giving back when we can.

name: Misti Alpaca Worsted Natural Dyed
description:
Misti Alpaca Worsted Best of Nature is exquisitely soft and heavenly to knit. A favorite yarn of both the beginner & experienced knitter. We have 11 of the most popular requested colors.  These are quality yarns you will be very pleased with, and of course they are 100% baby alpaca. 

Best of Nature Collection Nature can be generous in unexpected ways...
Misti Alpaca’s new Best of Nature yarn collection is one of these ways.
Using only natural dyes extracted from vegetable and mineral sources the Best of Nature yarns provides the exquisite colors that nature gives us day after day. It is important to know that the color shades will vary from lot to lot. We get what Nature gives us, thus the shades will vary from season to season. For example the blue corn
harvested in September will produce a slightly different shade than the blue corn harvested in October. However, the shade family will be the same.  Misti’s Peruvian partner Calicampo is a dye studio that extracts the natural dyes and immediately hand paints our wonderful Alpaca yarns. The end result is one of the most organic and environmentally responsible yarns available in the market. We have developed proprietary techniques of extracting the dyes and hand painting our yarns that results in a wonderful color palette and a hand paint effect that is truly unique.
Some of the most exciting features of Misti’s Best of Nature Worsted Alpaca collection are:

● All dyes are extracted from vegetable and natural sources
● Mordants used are also from natural sources and/or used in the lowest
concentration possible well in accordance with International Organic standards
● The 100% Baby Alpaca yarn is the most organically produced natural fiber in the
world
● All colors developed have passed color lightness tests conducted by independent
testing companies
● The yarns are also hand painted in our partner dye studio, giving them the unique
hand paint appearance

100 gram twisted hank, 4 ply worsted weight, 218 yards (200 meters),  Suggested needle size: range of 4 1/2 to 5 stitches per inch on U.S. size #8/7/6 needle

name: Yarn Ultra Fine Chorus From 7 Oaks Farm
description:
This is a ultra fine chorus yarn great for all your crochet, knitting and weaving needs. These yarns are made with our wool that is Certified Sorted and made in mills in the US.
Available in oatmeal, the wool is very soft to the touch.
Recommended for baby garments, chemo caps, and other gently used items, it is meant to be worn next to sensitive skin.
50% Huacaya alpaca and Suri Alpaca, 50% Wyoming Merino wool
Appx. 1.9 oz/200 yards
Needles US size 3-5
Gauge 5.75-6.5 sts/inch

options.name: Yarn Fawn Ultra Fine Chorus Yarn From 7 Oaks Farm

name: Super Fine 100% Alpaca Roving 7 Oaks Farm 2oz
description:
Super fine lofty 100% alpaca roving made with wool from our own alpacas and processed at mills in the US. These come in 2 ounce packages and I can combine multiply ounces together.
Use for items worn next to the skin, items needing loft, lightweight and insulated.

100% Certified Sorted
Made in the USA

name: "Best Hat Ever" From Seven Oaks Farm
description:
The workin’ hat and scarf!  You will definitely see why this is called the "Best Hat Ever"  Designed for shoveling, plowing, hockey games, football games, hunting, fishing, and those times when you need a durable hat to keep ya' toasty. So very comfy and doesn't have the itch most wool hats will have, sure to become your favorite hat. Alpaca wool is known to be less itchy and much more comfortable next to the skin. These make wonderful gifts for all occasions. Available in evergreen, deep purple, slate blue and red. 
These knit hats have a great heather finish to them and you can see the beautiful patterns of dark and light colors. 
Made in the USA

Hand wash/dry flat

I can add designs to your hat so that they are personalized, names, Bible verses and flowers have been pretty popular. I will send you a picture of the design so you can see it first. Add $5 on to the cost of the hat and an extra day for shipping. See the picture in the listing for some previous designs.
90% Huacaya alpaca, 5% Suri alpaca, 5% Wool.

name: "Best Hat Ever" Santiago Design
description:
These hats are made here in the US with wool from US grown alpacas and knitting mills here in the US. The Santigo hats are thick, warm and oh so very soft. They are comfortable to wear, durable and very warm. They are made exceptionally well and you will be very pleased with how dense the wool is. Each hat has a snowflake design and coordinating decorative tassel on top. These are part of the Seven Oaks Collection, we also have more "Best Ever Hats" and "Best Ever Socks".

70% Huacaya alpaca, 15% Suri alpaca, 15 % TencelTM.

We have new items arriving daily, if you do not see the item you are looking for, please ask.

name: "Best Sock Ever" Athletic Shortie
description:
These are called the Best Socks,  well because they are!!  They are made from wool from our own Farm and contain 70% Huacaya alpaca, 15% Wool, 15% Spandex.  

They are a dusted beige color,
 
Wonderfully insulating against heat and cold, help to wick moisture away from your feet. They are very soft as you would expect for alpaca, they wear well and resist pilling. They can be worn all season long because they are lightweight. These "Shorties" will soon become your favorite pair of socks. The more you wear and wash these socks the cozier they become!
Mediums - fit most ladies 7-9 & men's 6-8
Large - fit most ladies 11-13.5 & men 10-13

name: Yarn Fine Sport Earth Treasures 4ply from 7 Oaks Farm
description:
This is a Earth Treasure fine sport 4-ply yarn great for all your crochet, knitting and weaving needs. Colors are deep and rich. These yarns are made with our wool that is Certified Sorted from 7 Oaks Farm using mills in the US.
It is durable and will wear extremely well, yet it still has the “Oooooh” factor we are looking for in our hats, scarves, sweaters, gloves/mittens, and blankets.

Available in coffee, cream and tan 

90% Huacaya alpaca, 5% Suri Alpaca, 5% wool
Appx. 2 oz/100 yards
Needles US size 7-9
Gauge 4-5 sts/inch
